member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_ARCHITECTURE_INFO
member.summary: Note This structure is supported by the Direct3D 11.1 runtime, which is available on Windows 8 and later operating systems.Describes information about Direct3D 11.1 adapter architecture.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_ARCHITECTURE_INFO.TileBasedDeferredRenderer
member.summary: Specifies whether a rendering device batches rendering commands and performs multipass rendering into tiles or bins over a render area. Certain API usage patterns that are fine for TileBasedDefferredRenderers (TBDRs) can perform worse on non-TBDRs and vice versa. Applications that are careful about rendering can be friendly to both TBDR and non-TBDR architectures. TRUE if the rendering device batches rendering commands and FALSE otherwise.
